item.title: ‘John Candy: I Like Me’ Director Colin Hanks on Exploring the Private Trauma and Genius of a Comedy Legend
item.description: On screen, John Candy was often the gregarious life of the party. He smoked and drank through a game of racquetball in “Splash,” he charmed a household of unruly kids with his free-spirite
